projects.title: LLMs Project
projects.description: This project involves building a large language model from scratch, with core components developed independently and later fine-tuned using lit-GPT for improved performance.

projects.title: Weather and Energy Efficiency Prediction Project
projects.description: This project involves building a model to help predict weather conditions and energy efficiency using current weather API and NYC historical data.

projects.title: Book Review Project
projects.description: This project was developed in preparation for job hunting and learning Java and Springboot, technologies that are widely used in the industry.

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: This website is made with React and Tailwind CSS, and uses JSON data to display my information. This website is deployed on Vercel.
